t: Bubble Thing Big Bubble Mix | Soap Bubble Wiki | Fandom
s: March 10, 2025 - A world-class stir-and-go giant bubble recipe. Blows 40-footers in good weather. Measure into a clean bucket and stir: 16 cups hot water 1 cup Joy, Dawn, or Fairy dish soap 2 tablespoons Big Bubble Mix Check your weather at weather.com. Choose the highest humidity and lowest windspeed you can.

t: BUBBLE THING
s: The Bubble Thing was invented in 1984 by New York architect David Stein to amuse his baby daughter. It started the giant bubble sport of today. In 1988 it set the first-ever Guinness record for soap bubbles. Length: 50 ft. Volume: 240 cubic feet. The open-and-closeable fabric loop it pioneered ...
